strengths: Scenic coastal setting with strong sunset and sea-view appeal
Contemporary Mediterranean suites and villas with an upscale, relaxed design language
Resort experience balances island access with a calm, retreat-style atmosphere

common: Best for travelers seeking a polished island stay with strong on-property comfort and scenic downtime
Works best when dining, transfers, and activity plans are arranged in advance during peak periods

honeymoon: Strong fit for couples wanting sunset-facing luxury, privacy, and a refined resort base
Good option for honeymooners who want optional Ibiza exploration without a party-led stay
multi_gen_family: Good fit for families prioritizing suite/villa space and flexible island days
Less ideal for families expecting a heavily programmed kids-club-first resort experience
solo_wellness: Strong fit for solo wellness travelers who value spa time, sea views, and a calmer rhythm
Well suited to travelers mixing restorative treatments with light activity
corporate_executive: Selective fit for senior travelers combining recovery time with discreet luxury
Better for small leadership stays than conference-scale group programs

seasonality.late_september: Late September is typically a strong fit for clients who want warm sea conditions with a calmer post-peak island cadence.
seasonality.peak_summer: Peak Summer brings high demand across Ibiza; advance planning for dining, boats, and preferred room categories is important.
seasonality.shoulder_apr_may: Shoulder Season can offer a strong value-to-experience balance for luxury clients prioritizing scenery, dining, and spa time.
seasonality.low_nov_mar: Low season operations and venue availability can vary across the island; verify resort opening windows and service cadence before pitching.

risks.text: Some clients may over-index on Ibiza nightlife expectations; 7Pines is better positioned as a serene luxury base than a party-led resort.
Peak summer dining and activity availability can tighten quickly without advance booking coordination.
Arrival experience is strongest when transfer routing and timing are clearly arranged, especially during heavy island traffic windows.

promotions.name: 4th Night Free
promotions.description: 4th night free on select suite and villa categories in specified windows.

promotions.name: Early Booking 10%
promotions.description: 10% discount for eligible advance purchase bookings.

stackingRules.text: 4th Night Free cannot be combined with Early Booking discount unless a signed annex explicitly permits it.
Contract annex and official promo bulletins govern combinability; internal notes and chats are non-authoritative.

bookingIntelligence.qualitativeSummary: Upper-premium average booking value with strong summer and shoulder demand
patterns: Couples and celebratory leisure stays over-index in late summer and early autumn
Spa and sea-view categories see strong conversion when positioned as a serene Ibiza alternative

feedbackThemes.label: Views + dining
feedbackThemes.text: Guests consistently praise coastal views, sunset atmosphere, and standout dining experiences centered on Spanish flavors and seafood.

feedbackThemes.label: Pre-planning matters
feedbackThemes.text: Trip satisfaction improves when dining, transport, and activity reservations are coordinated early during busy dates.

talkTrack: Sell 7Pines Resort Ibiza as a scenic, refined coastal retreat with Ibiza access, not as a party-first resort.
Lead with sea views, design-forward suites/villas, and a strong dining plus wellness story.
Qualify for desired island energy level early, then position the resort as a calm luxury base with optional exploration.
